This is my second time buying this dress in a different color & I absolutely love it! This dress is super flattering, true to size & I always get so many compliments each time I wear it! Would recommend!!
the top and bottom look like they are two different shades of yellow. it fits well (i got a small - 5’6 130lbs 32c, 26 pant size) but this is getting returned.

I wore the PRETTYGARDEN Women’s Satin Summer Dress to a New Year’s Eve family party, and I absolutely loved it! The design is simple yet elegant, perfect for a festive gathering. The lightweight satin material kept me cool and comfortable while moving around our friends' house and keeping up with my energetic son.  The mock neck and sleeveless style added a touch of sophistication without being too formal. This dress is a great combination of style and comfort—I highly recommend it for cocktail parties or special occasions!
I absolutely loved it!! Got so many complement, true to size!

The dress is perfect bought it for my daughters bridal shower I’m 5”5 and 213lbs breast are large and the top fits perfect (40 DD ) color is vibrant and the material is nice and thick doesn’t look cheap at all! Love this brand gave a 4 star because the neck part is a bit lose but other than that great buy!

I got the printed bue in size L. I am 5', 150 lbs, apple shaped body. So needless to say this dress did not work for me.  Good: The size was right, width wise and the length was to the floor - fine. The fabric was nice, thick and silky and the print and colors were very nice (outdoor garden wedding MOB).  Not so good: It came in a very large box with lots of room, yet it was all bunched up in a little plastic bag which made the dress very wrinkled. The wrinkles came out after 24 hrs on a hanger. The neckline is very curious. It would not hang right. I think it was stitched a little off which caused an odd drape. There are buttons behind the neck which I had difficulty with, even with the dress off. No way could I button up with the dress on and I dont think my husband could do it either. The loops for the buttons were tiny, tiny. If you have an apple shaped body, this dress would make you look just like that - an apple. But you probably already know that. What was I thinking!  I do think this dress has lots of potential for other bodies.
Great dress, great quality, but definitely runs big. Ordered a small and it swallowed me. Other than that great dress! Would’ve been so cute!!!

I bought this dress for a cocktail work event and it did the job perfectly! I steam ironed it because it did show up very wrinkled but I was totally expecting that to happen. The quality felt nice and I got many compliments on it throughout the night! It can be dressed up or dressed down, which makes it a staple dress in the wardrobe.

I’m going to order this in Large and hope that it fits better on the bottom and still fits on top.
Bought this dress for a party with cocktail attire. It was perfect!

This dress is elegant and classy. I can’t wait to wear it for a night out. I was afraid it would be a bit thin but it’s thick enough that’s it’s very flattering. This beautifully lined dress is just perfect. It’s soft, it fits great, it is wrinkle resistant, and the fabric is thicker than I thought it would be. The elastic for the buttons requires someone else’s assistance

My only complaint is that the purple was not as saturated as I was expecting. It’s more of a light lavender but can vary depending on the lighting. I wore this to Thanksgiving dinner and have to say it is one of my favorite dresses now.  Any dress I can wear with boots is top notch for me.  Love the quality and size it true to fit.
